item.title: Three key technicals show how cautious macro fund managers are. That’s usually a good sign.
item.description: Macro fund managers have lower equity beta, lower futures exposure and are shorter on index ETFs

item.title: As a nurse, I’ve witnessed people abuse their power of attorney. Here are the signs.
item.description: “Even if someone has millions of dollars in retirement, that won’t keep them from being trapped in the hospital.”

item.title: Hedge-fund favorites are beating the market — and for the first time in three years, Tesla’s one of them.
item.description: The favorite stocks of hedge funds have outperformed the broader market this year, and for the first time since 2022, Tesla is one of them, an analysi...

item.title: The latest stock sell-off is just a rotation. Something bigger needs a trigger, says Citi.
item.description: Two days is not a trend says analysts Scott Chronert

item.title: Lucy Guo, world’s youngest self-made woman billionaire, buys $30 million L.A. mansion
item.description: Tech mogul Lucy Guo, the world’s youngest self-made woman billionaire, has invested a sizable portion of her enormous wealth into a new L.A. home.
